name: Puppetmaker - Don't make a sound - beta
name_original: Puppetmaker - Don't make a sound - beta
description:
Description

Our game is a 3D first Person Horror Game which takes place in an old dusty house. You are trapped in the house together with an old mysterious Puppet maker. The key is to be as silent as possible and escape the house by solving puzzles with logic (not trial and error) without being catched by him. 

Style

The Style is based on old PS1 graphics.

Controls

- WASD to move

- SPACE to hold breath if puppetmaker is near you

- SHIFT to sprint

- LEFT CLICK to pick up objects

- Hold RIGHT CLICK to throw objects

- LEFT CLICK to interact

- MOUSE WHEEL to open doors

Programs Used

-  Unity

- Autodesk Maya

- Blender

- Visual Studio

- Adobe Photoshop

- Adobe Premiere Pro

-  Adobe Audition

-  Audiokinetic Wwise
